name: Dakota Flight Center, LLC
about: Dakota Flight Center, LLC, located at the Mitchell Municipal Airport (KMHE), is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to nurturing the next generation of aviators. We offer a wide range of training programs, including Biennial Flight Reviews, Ground School, IFS Certifications, Instrument Proficiency Checks, Introductory Flights, and Time Building Programs. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive high-quality training in a safe and supportive environment. At Dakota Flight Center, we are committed to helping our students achieve their aviation goals with professionalism and excellence. We strive to make every flight a memorable and educational experience.
